aka: The Big Fat Quiz of the Noughties

cast.name: 凯文·布里吉斯 Kevin Bridges
理查德·艾欧阿德 Richard Ayoade

this_title: The Big Fat Quiz of the 00s
trans_title: The Big Fat Quiz of the Noughties
introduction: Jimmy Carr hosts the third and final of the special editions, looking back at the decade that inspires the thought: 'blimey, could we really not come up with a better name than the noughties?' Embarrassing.So why did the US briefly rename French fries? How did the Crazy Frog cause controversy? And what on earth was Touch the Truck?If you haven't got a clue about any of these questions then it's probably time you were in bed!If you do, then join guests Alan Carr, Kevin Bridges, David Mitchell, Sarah Millican, Richard Ayoade and Noel Fielding with special guest appearances from Duncan Bannatyne, Greg Wallace, McFly and Peter Andre as they give the noughties the Big Fat Quiz treatment.
foreign_title: The Big Fat Quiz of the 00s
